CourseF_outbreak4.challenge:
## Apo krkoni pr nj sfid shtes?

Ju gjithashtu mund t'i bni prbindshat t lvizin m shpejt ose m ngadal.

1.  Kliko \`Edito' n kt bllok  [blockly block][0] 
    Rritni ose zvogloni numrin n kt bllok: 

[blockly block][1]

Pr t'i br monstrat t lvizin m ngadal, zgjidhni nj numr dhjetor si `0.5` ose `0.25`. Pr t'i br ata t lvizin m shpejt, zgjidhni ndonj numr m t madh se 1.

CourseF_outbreak4_-2022-2.challenge:

Ju gjithashtu mund t'i bni prbindshat t lvizin m shpejt ose m ngadal.

1.  Kliko \`Edito' n kt bllok  <xml><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></xml> 
    Rritni ose zvogloni numrin n kt bllok: 

<xml><block type="gamelab_moveForward"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="sprite_parameter_get"><title name="VAR">this sprite</title></block></value><value name="DISTANCE"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value></block>
</xml>

Pr t'i br monstrat t lvizin m ngadal, zgjidhni nj numr dhjetor si `0.5` ose `0.25`. Pr t'i br ata t lvizin m shpejt, zgjidhni ndonj numr m t madh se 1.

Dance_2019_01.challenges:
**Sfidat opsionale**

-   Zgjidhni nj kng tjetr pr t luajtur.
-   Leviz valltarin tuaj n nj vend t ri.
-   Bni m shum se nj vallezues.
Dance_2019_01.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Sigurohuni q nj balerin shfaqet n ekran.

\_Ky nivel prfundon pas 4 masave. \_

Dance_2019_02.challenges:
**Sfida opsionale**

Prdorni m shum se nj <xml><block type="Dancelab_whenKey"><title name="KEY"></title></block></xml> bllok.
Dance_2019_02.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Vallezuesi duhet t kryej nj lvizje.
-   Ju duhet t shtypni nj shigjet.

\_Ky nivel prfundon pas 4 masave. \_

Dance_2019_03.challenges:
**Sfida opsionale**

-   Bni nj vallezues t'i prgjigjet butonave t majt dhe t djatht t shigjetave.
Dance_2019_03.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Vallezuesi duhet t kryej nj lvizje.
-   Ju duhet t shtypni nj shigjet.

\_Ky nivel prfundon pas 6 masave. \_

Dance_2019_04.validation:
**Si mund ta kaloj kete nivel?**

-   Vallezuesi duhet te kaloje ne nje levizje te re pas 4 masave. 

-   Niveli perfundon pas 7 masave.

Dance_2019_05.challenges:
**Sfida opsionale**

-   Ndryshoni sfondin sa her q vallezuesi ndrron levizjet.
Dance_2019_05.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Pas 6 masave, vallezuesi juaj duhet t bj nj valle t ndryshme nga ajo q ishte pas 4 masave.

\_Niveli prfundon pas 11 masave. \_

Dance_2019_06.challenges:
\*\* Sfida opsionale\*\*

-   Krijo shume grupe te vallezuesve rezerve.
Dance_2019_06.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Krijo nje vallezues kryesor dhe nje grup te vallezuesve rezerve brenda kater matjeve te para te kanges.

-   Ky nivel perfundon pas 7 matjeve

Dance_2019_07.challenges:
**Sfida opsionale**

-   Eksperimentoni duke ndryshuar veqantite e tjera (gjersia, lartsia, rotacioni, etj.
Dance_2019_07.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Ndrroni madhesine e se paku nje valletari.

\_Ky nivel prfundon pas 6 masave. \_

Dance_2019_08.tint_hint: A keni verejtur se vallezuesit tuaj nuk ndryshojne ne ngjyren qe ju e zgjidhni? Kjo eshte per shkak se "ngjyrat" perzijne ngjyren qe ju keni zgjedhur me ngjyren e vallezuesit.
Dance_2019_08.validation:
\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Ndryshoni ngjyren e se paku nje valletari.

\_Ky nivel prfundon pas 6 masave. \_

Dance_2019_09.repeat_every_ideas:
\*\*Keni nevoj pr disa ide? \*\*

-   Ndyrhosni madhesine e nje vallezuesi me shume se nje here ne menyre qe ta beni qe ai te rritet. 
-   Ndryshoni rotanicion e nje vallezuesi me shume se nje here ne menyre qe te beni te rrotullohet! 

\_Ju gjithashtu mund t prdorni numra negativ pr t krijuar nj efekt t kundrt! \_

\*\*Si mund ta kaloj kt nivel? \*\*

-   Thjesht shtypni butonin Finish!

course3_bee_functions_challenge4.courseF_bee_functions_challenge2_b:
**Zgjidhja:**

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">4</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_untilBlocked">
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_move">
                <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_if">
                    <title name="DIR">isPathRight</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="procedures_callnoreturn" id="function">
                        <mutation name="move and check"/>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" editable="false" usercreated="true">
    <mutation/>
    <title name="NAME">check nectar or honey</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="bee_ifElseFlower">
        <title name="LOC">atFlower</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
            <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
            <title name="OP">></title>
            <title name="ARG2">0</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_nectar"/>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <statement name="ELSE">
          <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
            <title name="ARG1">honeyAvailable</title>
            <title name="OP">></title>
            <title name="ARG2">0</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_honey"/>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" deletable="false" movable="false" editable="false">
    <mutation/>
    <title name="NAME">move and check</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">2</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="procedures_callnoreturn">
            <mutation name="check nectar or honey"/>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_untilBlocked">
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_turn">
                        <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                      </block>

courseA_harvester_seq2_2021.courseA_harvester_seq2_b: Provoni t shkruani hapat n letr pr t gjetur nj zgjidhje!

courseA_harvester_seq3_2021.courseA_harvester_seq3_a:
A ju kujtohet se si t prdorni kt bllok?

<xml><block type="harvester_corn"/></xml>
courseA_harvester_seq3_2021.courseA_harvester_seq3_b: Thuajini hapat me z t lart dhe shikoni nse ju ndihmon t kuptoni prgjigjen.

courseA_harvester_seq4_2021.courseA_harvester_seq4_a: Sa hapsira ka midis korrses dhe misrit? Sa blloqe jan tashm n hapsirn tuaj punuese?
courseA_harvester_seq4_2021.courseA_harvester_seq4_b:
Do t'ju duhen pes blloqe 'Lvizni nga lindja' dhe nj bllok 'Mbledhni misrin':

<xml><block type="harvester_corn"/></xml>

courseA_harvester_seq5_2021.courseA_harvester_seq5_a: Cili bllok e lviz korrsen n kah t gabuar?
courseA_harvester_seq5_2021.courseA_harvester_seq5_b: Ju duhet t hiqni nj bllok.

courseA_harvester_seq6_2021.courseA_harvester_seq6_a: Nse keni ngecur, provoni t thoni hapat me z t lart. Kjo mund t'ju ndihmoj t gjeni rrugn e duhur.

courseA_harvester_seq7_2021.courseA_harvester_seq7_a: Provoni t zgjidhni enigmn n 2 pjes, nj pjes para kndit dhe nj pjes pas kndit.
courseA_harvester_seq7_2021.courseA_harvester_seq7_b: Keni vshtirsi? Kjo sht rruga q duhet t marr korrsja.

courseA_harvester_seq8_2021.courseA_harvester_seq8_a: Kodi juaj prfundimtar duhet t ket **4** blloqe pr t lvizur dhe **2** blloqe pr t mbledhur.

courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_a: Ekzekuto kodin disa her pr t par se far ndodh. Ku ndalet korrsja?
courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_b: Mos harroni t mblidhni t gjith misrin! Do t ju duhen **3** blloqe pr mbledhjen e misrit.
courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_c: Prdoreni kt rrug pr t mbledhur t gjith misrin.

courseA_maze_seq10_2021.courseA_maze_seq10_a: Nse keni vshtirsi, provoni fillimisht t shkruani hapat n nj cop letre.
courseA_maze_seq10_2021.courseA_maze_seq10_b: Ju do t duhet t shkoni n 3 drejtime t ndryshme pr t zgjidhur kt enigm.

courseA_maze_seq13_2021.courseA_maze_seq13_a: Nse rruga q ju nevojitet sht e paqart, prdorni gishtin tuaj pr t gjurmuar rrugn tuaj nga zogu pr te derri.
courseA_maze_seq13_2021.courseA_maze_seq13_b: Mos kini frik t bni ndonj gabim! Provoni t shtoni blloqe dhe t ekzekutoni kodin pr t par se far do t ndodh.
courseA_maze_seq13_2021.courseA_maze_seq13_c:
Kto <xml><block type="maze_moveNorth"/></xml>

<xml><block type="maze_moveEast"/></xml>

  blloqe do t'ju ndihmojn t'i afroheni derrit

courseA_maze_seq1_2021.courseA_maze_seq1_a:
Nse keni probleme pr t lvizur zogun, sigurohuni q blloqet t jen t lidhura n vend nn <xml>
  <block type="when_run"/>
</xml>
courseA_maze_seq1_2021.courseA_maze_seq1_b:
Zogut do t'i duhet t lviz n Perndim 3 her pr t arritur te derri. Prdorni kt bllok:

<xml><block type="maze_moveWest"/></xml>

courseA_maze_seq6_2021.courseA_maze_seq6_a: Kodi juaj prfundimtar duhet t ket 3 blloqe lvizse.
courseA_maze_seq6_2021.courseA_maze_seq6_b: Nse ngecni, provoni ta zgjidhni enigmn n 2 pjes, nj pjes para kndit dhe nj pjes pas kndit.

courseA_maze_seq8_2021.courseA_maze_seq8_a: Nse keni ngecur, provoni t vizatoni imazhin n letr pr t par se si duhet t lviz zogu.

courseA_maze_seq_challenge1_2021.courseA_maze_seq_challenge1_a: Ka dy mnyra pr ta zgjidhur kt enigm.

courseA_maze_seq_challenge2_2021.courseA_maze_seq_challenge2_a: Provoni t numroni hapsirat me gishtin tuaj. Mos harroni t numroni hapsirn ku filloni!

courseA_playLab_events2_2021.courseA_playLab_events2_a: Krkoni nj bllok q e bn qenin t thot dika.
courseA_playLab_events2_2021.courseA_playLab_events2_b:
Ky sht kodi q do t'ju duhet pr t prfunduar kt enigm:

<xml>
<block type="when_run" movable="false" deletable="false">
<next>
<block type="studio_saySpriteChoices">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="VALUE">Hi there.</title>
  </block>
</next>
</block>
</xml>

courseA_playLab_events3_2021.courseA_playLab_events3_a:
Trhiqeni jasht kt bllok <xml><block type="studio_move">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="DIR">8</title>
  </block></xml> dhe prplaseni at n fund t <xml><block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">left</title>
  </block></xml>
courseA_playLab_events3_2021.courseA_playLab_events3_b: Mos harroni t prdorni tastin e majt t shigjets pr t lvizur Jorgen te flamuri pasi t keni shkruar programin tuaj. Kur flamuri bhet i gjelbr, ju keni e keni prfunduar nivelin!

    <title name="DIR">2</title>
  </block></xml>

    <next>

  </block></next></block></xml>

courseB_artist_loops2_2021.courseB_artist_loops2_a: Nse dshironi q loop-i t prsritet m shum se 4 her, ju mund t ndryshoni numrin n krye t bllokut.
courseB_artist_loops2_2021.courseB_artist_loops2_b: Provoni s pari t ekzekutoni kodin pr t par se ku prfundon artisti.

courseB_artist_loops3_2021.courseB_artist_loops3_a:
Mos harroni t prdorni nj loop prsrits <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
    <title name="TIMES">???</title>
  </block></xml> pr nj kodim m t mir!
courseB_artist_loops3_2021.courseB_artist_loops3_b: Artistit do t'i duhet t lviz nga jugu pr t vizatuar kt vij.

courseB_artist_loops4_2021.courseB_artist_loops4_a: Blloku i krcimit ju lejon t ecni prpara pa vizatuar nj vij.
courseB_artist_loops4_2021.courseB_artist_loops4_b: Do t ju duhet t shtoni nj bllok brenda loop-it t prsritur pr t zgjidhur kt enigm.
courseB_artist_loops4_2021.courseB_artist_loops4_c: Mos harroni t ndryshoni numrin e herve q loop-i prsritet.

courseB_artist_loops5_2021.courseB_artist_loops5_a:

  </block></xml>, m pas vendosni blloqet e tjera brenda tij. Sa her duhet t prsrisni?

courseB_artist_loops6_2021.courseB_artist_loops6_b: Provoni t shkruani lvizjet n nj cop letr dhe krkoni nj model.

courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_a: Kjo sfid prdor **4** loop-e, njra pas tjetrs!
courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_b:
Vini re se do loop bn nj model shkallsh q shkon n nj drejtim t ndryshm.

courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_c:
Loop-et duhet t bjn kt:

-   Loop 1
    -   Djathtas
    -   Posht

-   Loop 2
    -   Djathtas
    -   Lart

-   Loop 3
    -   Majtas
    -   Lart

-   Loop 4
    -   Majtas
    -   Posht

courseB_artist_loops8_2021.courseB_artist_loops8_a: Sa her duhet t prsrisni modelin pr t br shkalln?
courseB_artist_loops8_2021.courseB_artist_loops8_b: Provoni t ekzekutoni kodin e dhn pr t par se far ndodh.

courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_a: Mos harroni se blloqet e krcimit mund t prdoren pr t lvizur pa trhequr nj vij.
courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_b: Ju do t dshironi t prdorni bllokun P pr t zgjidhur kt enigm.
courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_c: Nuk mund t kuptoni se ku t vendosni kt loop? Provoni t shkruani kodin hap pas hapi dhe krkoni nj model.

courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_a: Blloqe si kjo: <xml>  <block type="simple_move_up_right"/></xml> do ta lejojn artistin tuaj t lviz n nj pjerrtsi!
courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_b: Kur t prfundoni nj nga zaret, hidheni tjetrn!
courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_c: Do t ju duhet t lvizni ose krceni mbi disa nga t njjtat rreshta dy her.

courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_b:
Filloni duke prsritur komandat e mposhtme:

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
    <next>
    <block type="collector_collect"></block>
    </next>
    </block>
</xml>
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_c:
Lvizni nga lindja dy her mes secils rrug.

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"><next>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"></block></next></block>
  </xml>

Ju mund ta bni kt me vetm 14 blloqe. Klikoni pr nj hint tjetr pr t par nj zgjidhje.
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_d:
Provo kt!

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
        <title name="TIMES">5</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_moveSouth">
            <next>
              <block type="collector_collect"/>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="maze_moveEast">
            <next>
              <block type="maze_moveEast">
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                    <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="collector_collect">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveNorth"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_moveEast">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveEast">
                            <next>
                              <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                                <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                                <statement name="DO">
                                  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
                                    <next>
                                      <block type="collector_collect"/>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>
                                </statement>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea1: Keni nevoj pr nj ide? \_ \*\*Kush sht atje? \*\* Bni karaktere t shfaqen me imazhe t rastsishme, kshtu q askush nuk e di se kush po shfaqet m pas.
courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea2: Keni nevoj pr nj ide? \_ **Duke shkuar n nj aventur** - Ndryshoni prapavijn, pastaj bni personazhet t flasin pr vendin ku jan tani.
courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea3:
Keni nevoj pr nj ide? \_

**Pinball** - Bni nj lvizje karakteri duke prdorur tastet e shigjetave (prdorni `kur shigjeta lart`, `kur blloqet e shigjets posht`), pastaj luani tinguj t rastsishm kur prplaset me personazhe t tjer n ekran.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_a:
Provoni t prdorni bllokun krce prpara pr t shkuar nga maja e nj katrori n vendin ku do t filloni tjetrin. 

Nse katrort tuaja jan 20 piksele t larta dhe ato jan 20 piksele larg, sa larg duhet t hidheni?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_b: Mos harroni t prdorni nested loop pr t'a zgjidhur kt enigm shpejt.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_c: Filloni duke prdorur nj loop `prsrit` pr t'a br nj katror. Pastaj, prsriteni at katror 8 her duke krcyer 40 piksele n mes.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_a:
Pr t'a br nj rreth:

-   Prsriteni 360 her
    -   Lvizni prpara 1 pixel
    -   Kthehuni majtas 1 shkall
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_b: Mos harroni t hidheni prpara me 50 piksele midis qarqeve.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_c: Prdorni nj nested loop pr t vizatuar rratht tuaj 4 her.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_d: Pr t'a zgjidhur kt n mnyr korrekte, do t'ju duhet t lvizni **para** se t ktheheni ose prndryshe rratht tuaj do t fiken nga shuma m e vogl!

courseD_artist_nestedLoops52022.courseD_artist_nestedLoops5_a:

    -   krceni prpara 50 piksel
    -   kthehuni djathtas 90 shkall

courseD_bee_conditionals1_predict1_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals1_a: Ju do t duhet t prdorni nj bllok nse pr t par nse ka nj lule nn re para se t prpiqeni t merrni nektar.

courseD_bee_conditionals2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals2_a: Ndonjher nj lule do t jet atje, ndonjher jo. Nse dshironi q kodi juaj t ekzekutohet n t dyja rastet, sigurohuni q t prdorni nj deklarat nse.
courseD_bee_conditionals2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals2_c: Ju nuk keni pse t kontrolloni pr huall mjalti, do t ket vetm lule ose hapsira bosh nn re.

courseD_bee_conditionals3_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals3_a: Sigurohuni q t prdorni nj deklarat nse pr t kontrolluar do hapsir pr t par nse ka ose nj lule ose asgj.
courseD_bee_conditionals3_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals3_c: Mos keni frik t gaboni! Provo t shtoni blloqe dhe t ekzekutoni kodin pr t par se far do t ndodh edhe nse nuk e ke zgjidhur enigmn akoma.

courseD_bee_conditionals4_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals4_a: Ju prap mund t'a trajtoni do hapsir sikur t ket nj re mbi t, edhe pse mund t shihni t gjith rrugn.
courseD_bee_conditionals4_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals4_b: Prdorni nj deklarat `nse` brenda loop-it tuaj pr t kontrolluar do hapsir pr nektar.

courseD_bee_conditionals5_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals5_a: Nse prdorni nj bllok nse n lule, mund t'a zgjidhni kt duke prdorur nj nested loop. Shkruani nj program pr shtigjet e majta dhe t poshtme, pastaj prsritni gjithka dy her!
courseD_bee_conditionals5_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals5_c: Pr t vazhduar n rrug bleta do t duhet t ec prpara. Ndrsa lviz, bleta duhet t kontrolloj pr nj lule nse ka nj lule, bleta duhet t marr nektar.

courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_a: Sigurohuni q t prdorni nj deklarat if q t kontrolloni pr huall mjalti nn do re.
courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_b: N kt rast, ju nuk keni nevoj t kontrolloni pr lule nn re.
courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_c: A ka nj loop q mund t'a prdorni pr t br kodin tuaj m t thjesht?

courseD_bee_conditionals7_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\*Mos harroni: \*\* Kjo enigm ndryshon sa her q ekzekutohet.  

Ju do t dshironi t prdorni nj bllok t kushtzuar (if/else) pr t'a zgjidhur sfidn.
courseD_bee_conditionals7_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_b: Nse nuk ka nj lule nn re duhet t ket nj huall mjalti, kshtu q nuk keni nevoj t mendoni pr rastin e nj hapsire boshe.

courseD_bee_conditionals7_predict2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\*Mos harroni: \*\* Kjo enigm ndryshon sa her q ekzekutohet.  

Ju do t dshironi t prdorni nj bllok t kushtzuar (if/else) pr t'a zgjidhur sfidn.

courseD_bee_conditionals8_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals8_a:
\*\*Mos harroni: \*\* Kjo enigm ndryshon sa her q ekzekutohet.  

Ju do t dshironi t prdorni nj bllok t kushtzuar (nse ose nse/tjetr) pr t'a zgjidhur sfidn.
courseD_bee_conditionals8_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals8_b:
Kjo enigm sht e ndrlikuar sepse ju nuk mund t kontrolloni katrort bosh, nektar, _dhe_ mjalt me vetm nj kushtzim t vetm.

Kontrolloni vetm pr nektar dhe mjalt n fund t rrugs suaj.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_a: A mund t gjeni nj rrug q arrin do lule dhe huall mjalti pa goditur asnj pem? Rruga m e mir sht nj spirale.
courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b: N kt enigm do hapsir mund t ket nj lule, nj huall mjalti ose asgj. Kjo do t thot q ju mund t prsritni kushtzimin tuaj `if/else` n do katror.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b:
Ashtu si blloqet 'if at flower', kodi brenda nj 'while nectar > 0' do t funksionoj vetm nse bleta sht n nj lule. Dallimi sht se kodi brenda do t kaloj vazhdimisht derisa t mos mbetet asnj nektar. Provoni kt model:

<xml>  <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
    <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
    <title name="OP">></title>
    <title name="ARG2">0</title>                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_nectar"/>
                    </statement>
  </block></xml>

courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_a: Nuk punon? Provoni t prdorni butonin Hapi pr t par se far ndodh rresht pas rreshti.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_b: Provoni s pari t shkruani kodin pr njrn an t katrorit. Mund ta prsritni kt pr t'a marr gjith nektarin?
courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_c: Mos harroni t prdorni bllokun merrni nektar sapo t jeni n nj katror me nj lule.

courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_a: Pr t'a zgjidhur kt mister, do t'ju duhet t ndrtoni nj loop `prsrit` brenda nj tjetri.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_b: Nuk mund t kuptoni se ku t'i vendosni loops? Provoni t shkruani kodin n letr hap pas hapi dhe krkoni nj model.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_c: Mos harroni se mund t vendosni m shum se nj bllok brenda nj loop.

courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_a: Ju do t duhet t prsrisni `merrni nektar` brenda nj prsritjeje tjetr q gjithashtu ka bllokun lviz prpara brenda tij.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_b: Ju do t duhet t prdorni t tre blloqet prsrit n dispozicion pr t zgjidhur kt enigm.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_c:
Ngjitni blloqet tuaja n thellsi t tre niveleve, si kto:

-   prsrit 4
    -   prsrit 3
        -   prsrit 12
            -   merr nektarin
        -   lviz prpara
    -   kthehu djathtas

courseD_bounce_events10s_2021.courseD_bounce_events10s_a:
Duhet t'i keni t dyja eventet n kodin tuaj:

<xml><block type="bounce_whenBallInGoal" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_playSound"><title name="SOUND">swish</title><next><block type="bounce_incrementPlayerScore"></block></next></block></next></block><block type="bounce_whenBallMissesPaddle" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_playSound"><title name="SOUND">whistle</title><next><block type="bounce_incrementOpponentScore"></block></next></block></next></block></xml>

courseD_bounce_events11s_2021.courseD_bounce_events11s_a: Ju do t duhet t hidhni nj top kur loja fillon, kur ju goditi shportn dhe kur dora humbet topin.

courseD_bounce_events12s_2021.courseD_bounce_events12s_a: Ju mund t prshpejtoni basketbollin ose dorn duke i bashkangjitur ato blloqe n eventin kur vraponi.
courseD_bounce_events12s_2021.courseD_bounce_events12s_b: Provoni t bni do goditje me vler 2 pik dhe t ndryshoni logon e ekipit n at nga vendlindja juaj!

courseD_bounce_events1s_2021.courseD_bounce_events1s_a:
Duhet t'a shtoni bllokun `lviz majtas` te eventi `kur shigjeta e majt` q kjo loj t funksionoj:

 <xml> <block type="bounce_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveLeft"/>
    </next>
  </block>

   </xml>
courseD_bounce_events1s_2021.courseD_bounce_events1s_b: Mos harroni t shtypni Run dhe t oni dorn te shporta pr t'a zgjidhur kt enigm.

courseD_bounce_events2s_2021.courseD_bounce_events2s_a:
Ju duhet t keni dy grupe t eventeve "lviz" t koduara q kjo t ket sukses:

<xml>
  <block type="bounce_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveLeft"/>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="bounce_whenRight" deletable="false" x="180" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveRight"/>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseD_bounce_events5s_2021.courseD_bounce_events5s_a: Ju nuk keni nevoj q t'a lvizni dorn pr t'a zgjidhur kt enigm.
courseD_bounce_events5s_2021.courseD_bounce_events5s_b:
Sigurohu q e keni shtuar kt kod n hapsirn tuaj punuese:

<xml>  <block type="bounce_whenPaddleCollided" deletable="false"> <next> <block type="bounce_bounceBall"/></next></block></xml>

courseD_bounce_events6s_2021.courseD_bounce_events6s_a:
A keni nj event q duket kshtu?

<xml><block type="bounce_whenWallCollided" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_bounceBall"></block></next></block></block></xml>
courseD_bounce_events6s_2021.courseD_bounce_events6s_b: Nse e keni shkruar kodin n mnyr korrekte nuk keni pse t'a lvizni dorn pr t fituar.

courseD_bounce_events7s_2021.courseD_bounce_events7s_a: Ju mund t shtoni tinguj n m shum vende nse ju plqen!

courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_bee_nested_loops_challenge2_a: Mos harroni se mund t prsritni nj komand t vetme ose nj model m t gjat. Ju madje mund t prsritni nj bllok prsritje!

courseD_farmer_condLoops1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops1_a: Ju do t duhet t krkoni misr 5 her, duke prdorur nj lak t prsritur.
courseD_farmer_condLoops1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops1_b: Sigurohuni q t prdorni nj bllok "if at corn" ose mund t prpiqeni t zgjidhni dika q nuk sht aty!

courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_a: Mnyra m e mir pr ta br kt sht t folezoni deklaratat if duke vendosur njrn brenda tjetrs.
courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_b: Pr kt mister, duhet t keni nj deklarat if/else dhe nj deklarat t thjesht if.
courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_c:
Deklarata juaj if mund t duket shum si kjo:

-   if nj misr
    -   marr misr
-   else
    -   if nj sallat
        -   sallat

Nse nuk ka asgj atje, nuk do t vini asgj!

courseD_farmer_condLoops3_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops3_a:
Pr t marr t gjitha sendet, provoni t lidhni deklaratat if tre her thell.

Kjo do t thot q ju duhet t vendosni nj deklarat if brenda nj tjetr, pastaj vendosni nj deklarat t tret if brenda nj deklarate t dyt.
courseD_farmer_condLoops3_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops3_b: Pr kt mister, duhet t keni nj deklarat if/else dhe nj deklarat t thjesht if.

courseD_farmer_condLoops4_2021.grade3_RunningFarm_4courseD_farmer_condL:
Askush nuk e di se sa tufa t sallatave do t rriten nga do bim.

Prdorni nj loop derisa ka sallata pr t vazhduar mbledhjen derisa secila pjes t jet mbledhur.

courseD_farmer_condLoops5_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops5_b: Mund t ket m shum se nj bim misri ose sallat n do vend. Prdorni nj loop while pr t mbledhur t gjitha!

courseD_farmer_condLoops7_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops7_a:
Vini re se rruga m e leht pr t arritur n t gjitha kulturat sht ende nj spirale.

![](https://images.code.org/ba8b8c624f21ade9ac823b045085c435-image-1479364378437.png)
courseD_farmer_condLoops7_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops7_b: Provoni t prdorni ndrsa rruga prpara pr ta mbajtur korrsin t lviz numrin e duhur t hapave.

courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_a: Butoni Hapi mund t jet shum i dobishm n kt sfid.

courseD_farmer_while1_2021.courseD_farmer_while1_a: Ju do t ju duhet t lvizni prpara katr her pr t arritur tek grumbulli. A mund t prdorni nj loop prsrit pr kt?
courseD_farmer_while1_2021.courseD_farmer_while1_b: Prdorni bllokun `hiqni 1` kur po qndroni n grumbullin e dheut pr ta hequr at.

courseD_farmer_while2_2021.courseD_farmer_while2_a: Ju do t duhet vetm q t lvizni nj her pr t arritur tek gropa.
courseD_farmer_while2_2021.courseD_farmer_while2_b: Ju do t ju duhet blloku `mbush 1` gjasht her. A mund t prdorni nj loop pr t'a br kt m t thjesht?

courseD_farmer_while3_2021.courseD_farmer_while3_a: Nj loop mund t'ju ndihmoj t thjeshtoni kodin tuaj ktu.
courseD_farmer_while3_2021.courseD_farmer_while3_b: Ju nuk duhet t keni nevoj pr blloqe kthehu pr t arritur n grumbull.

courseD_farmer_while4_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals4_a: N vend q t prdorni nj loop `prsrit` prdorni nj loop `while` ndersa pr t vazhduar grmimin derisa dheu t zhduket.
courseD_farmer_while4_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals4_b: Kjo duket shum e ngjashme me nj enigm t mparshme, i vetmi ndryshim sht se cili loop ju nevojitet.

courseD_farmer_while5_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals5a_a: Provoni t fusni nj while loop brenda nj \`prsrit' loop.
courseD_farmer_while5_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals5a_b: Fermeri duhet t ec prpara gjithsej pes her pr t arritur n fund t rreshtit. far tjetr duhet t bj fermerja?
courseD_farmer_while5_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals5a_c: Lvizni prpara 5 her. Sa her q ecni prpara hiqni grumbullin e dheut duke prdorur bllokun prderisa sht nj grumbull.

courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_a: Sigurohuni q po prdorni while loop pr t'a kuptuar se sa her duhet t'a mbushni seciln grop.
courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_b: Vini re se fermerja duhet t ec prpara dhe posht disa her n nj model shkallsh.
courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_c:
Modeli i shkallve prdor blloqet e mposhtme

-   Ec prpara
-   Mbush gropn
-   Kthehu djathtas
-   Ec prpara
-   Mbush gropn
-   Kthehu majtas

Sa her ju duhet q t'a prdorni kt model shkallsh?

Sigurohuni q po prdorni "prderisa ka nj vrim" pr t'a mbushur gropn.

courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_a: Blloku ndrsa ecni prpara ju lejon t vazhdoni edhe nse nuk e dini sa katror jan n nj rrug.
courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_b: Vendosja e nj loop ndrsa ecni prpara brenda nj loop t prsritur mund t'ju ndihmoj n kt enigm.
courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: far duhet t bni n fund t do rruge?

courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_a: Ju do t duhet t prdorni m shum se nj while loop.
courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_b: do vrim sht n fund t nj rruge, prandaj prdorni derisa ecni prpara para se t prdorni derisa ka nj vrim.
courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: Vini re se ju duhet t prsritni kodin derisa ecni prpara, derisa ka nj vrim gjasht her.

courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: sht e mundur q t'a zgjidhni kt pa prdorur asnj loop prsrit. Pr t'a br kt, do t'ju duhet t prdorni katr whileloop.
courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_a: do grop ose grumbull sht e vendosur nj hapsir **prapa** nga fundi i rrugs.
courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_b: Nse prdorni nj while loop mund t'i thoni fermeres t heq nj grumbull ose t mbush nj grop edhe nse nuk sht atje. Kjo do t thot q ju mund ta programoni at pr t hequr do papastrti ose pr t mbushur ndonj grop pa marr parasysh se ku sht.

Ju do t duhet t vendosni nj loop t vogl brenda loop-it tuaj kryesor pr t zgjidhur kt enigm!

courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_a: `for` loop-i juaj do t numroj nga 15 n 300 nga 15.
courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_b: Vendosni nj lviz prpara dhe nj bllok `kthehu` brenda ktij `for` loop-i.
courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_c: Gjithka q duhet t ndryshoni sht numri i shkallve n bllokun kthehu.

courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_a: Lapsi sht m i holl n kt enigm. Ju do t duhet t vendosni at n `1` para se t filloni.
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_b: Vini re se kjo spirale kthehet djathtas n vend se n t majt!
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_c: `for` loop-i n kt enigm shkon nga 15 n 300 nga 2.
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_d: Ky imazh sht br duke u kthyer vetm 89 shkall.

courseF_artist_for8_2021.courseF_artist_for8_a: Mbani gjithka tjetr t njjt n kodin tuaj, vetm kndi q kthehet duhet t ndryshoj.
courseF_artist_for8_2021.courseF_artist_for8_b: Nse dshironi, mund t zgjidhni nj ngjyr tjetr pr spiralen tuaj!

courseF_artist_for9_2021.courseF_artist_for9_a: Nse vendosni bllokun `vendos alpha-n` brenda `for` loop-it tuaj, dhe prdorni variablin `counter` pr ta ndryshuar at, ju mund t krijoni nj dizajn si ky.
courseF_artist_for9_2021.courseF_artist_for9_b: Blloku `vendos alfan` ndryshon errsirn e nj ngjyre. Sa m e vogl t jet vlera, aq m transparente sht ngjyra.

courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_a: A mund t gjeni nj model midis numrit t hapave q duhet t bni dhe numrit t nektarve q duhet t mbledhni?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_b: Seti i par i luleve ka gjithsej **14 lule**. Pr t arritur n kt grup t par, bleta duhet t gumzhin **7 katror** (ose 14 katror t ndar me 2.) Sa lule jan n grupin tjetr dhe sa katror do t ket bleta pr t udhtuar pr t arritur atje?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_c:
N enigm, grupi i par i luleve ka **14** lule, grupi i dyt ka **10** lule, grupi i tret ka **6** lule dhe grupi i katrt ka **2** lule.

N kt vizatim, vini re se ka **7** katror t kuq, **5** katror portokalli, **3** katror jeshil dhe **1** bllok blu.

![](<https://images.code.org/602ce14659299af6a59a79ebd0bdb9d4-image-1493221855089.6.11 Hint Drawing.png>)

Si lidhen numrat?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_d: Do t ju duhet t keni 2 prsritje, njri do t prdor nj bllok matematik.

courseF_bee_for11_2021.courseF_bee_for11_a:
Sa m pak sht 12 se 15?
Sa m pak sht 9 se 12?

A shihni nj model?

courseF_bee_for1_2021.courseF_bee_for1_b: Do t ju duhen dy blloqe n loop-in tuaj 'prsrits' pr t mbledhur t gjith nektarin.

courseF_bee_for2_2021.courseF_bee_for2_a: Nse jeni t hutuar, punoni nj lule n t njjtn koh dhe provoni shpesh.
courseF_bee_for2_2021.courseF_bee_for2_b: Mos harroni t ecni prpara midis secilit loop, kshtu q t arrini do lule.

courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_a: Prdorni nj `for` loop q shkon nga numri 1 n 7 me nj rritje prej 1 pr t zgjidhur kt enigm.
courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_b: Brenda `for` loop-it tuaj, do t dshironi t keni nj komand lviz prpara dhe nj loop pr t mbledhur nektar.
courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_c: Sigurohuni q t prdorni variablin `counter` brenda loop-it tuaj t prsritur pr t marr nektar t mjaftueshm!

courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_a: Kt her, blloku juaj `lviz prpara` dhe blloku juaj `mbledh nektarin` do t duhet t jen n loops t `prsritur` t veanta , t dyja brenda t njjtit `for` loop.
courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_b: Prdorni variablin counter n seciln loop n mnyr q bleta t lviz distanca t ndryshme midis secils lule.
courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_c: Mos keni frik t gaboni! Provo t shtoni blloqe dhe t ekzekutoni kodin pr t par se far do t ndodh edhe nse nuk e ke zgjidhur enigmn akoma.

courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_a: Mos harroni t prdorni nj variabl `counter` brenda loop-it tuaj `prsrits`.
courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_b: Brenda `for` loop-it tuaj, do t dshironi t keni nj komand lviz prpara dhe nj loop pr t mbledhur nektar.
courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_c: Loop-i juaj duhet t numroj **nga 5 n 1**.

courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_a: `for` loop-i juaj do t duhet t numroj nga 1 n 7 nga 2.
courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_b: Brenda `for` loop-it tuaj do t dshironi t keni nj komand lviz prpara dhe nj loop pr t mbledhur nektar.
courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_c: Mos harroni t prdorni variablin "counter" n loop-in tuaj "prsrits".

courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_a:
Nse loop-i juaj po numrohet, rritja i shtohet variablit t kundrt do her.

far duhet t shtoni n do numr pr t marr sasin tjetr t nektarit?
courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_b: N kt enigm, ju do t duhet pr t lvizni nj hap n nj model shkallsh pr t arritur te lulet.
courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_c: Loop-i juaj do t llogaris\* nga 3 n 15\* me disa rritje. far sht ajo?

courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_a:
Provoni t bni pak matematik me variablin counter.

far duhet t bni me counnter t do luleje pr t barazuar sasin e nektarit q duhet t grumbulloni?
courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_b: \*\*Mos harroni: \*\* Nse loop-i juaj sht duke numruar mbrapsht, rritja sht shtuar do her n variabl tuaj `counter`.
courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_c: Duket sikur do t'ju duhet ta ktheni bletn n fillim t secilit prsritje t do loop-i nse doni t zgjidhni enigmn.

                        </statement>

            <next>

                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_for" inline="true">
                    <title name="VAR">counter</title>

                        <title name="NUM">2</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>

                        <title name="NUM">10</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>

                        <title name="NUM">2</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_moveForward">

                            <next>

                                  <block type="maze_turn">

                                        </statement>
                                      </block>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>

                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>

                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">

          <block type="maze_untilBlocked">

              <block type="maze_move">
                <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_if">
                    <title name="DIR">isPathRight</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="procedures_callnoreturn" id="function">
                      <mutation name="move and check"></mutation>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" editable="false">
  <mutation></mutation>
    <title name="NAME">move and check</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">2</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="procedures_callnoreturn">
          <mutation name="check nectar or honey"></mutation>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_untilBlocked">
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_turn">
                        <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" editable="false" usercreated="true">
  <mutation></mutation>
    <title name="NAME">check nectar or honey</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
        <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
        <title name="OP">></title>
        <title name="ARG2">0</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_nectar"/>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
            <title name="ARG1">honeyAvailable</title>
            <title name="OP">></title>
            <title name="ARG2">0</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_honey"/>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

courseF_text_concat.prompt_example:
<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_setPrompt">
        <value name="QUESTION">
          <block type="text">
            <title name="TEXT">What is your name?</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="VAR">
          <block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
            <title name="VAR">name</title>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="gamelab_whenPromptAnswered">
    <value name="VAR">
      <block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
        <title name="VAR">name</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_printText">
        <value name="TEXT">
          <block type="gamelab_textJoin">
            <title name="TEXT1">Hello, </title>
            <value name="TEXT2">
              <block type="gamelab_textVariableJoin">
                <title name="VAR">name</title>
                <value name="TEXT2">
                  <block type="gamelab_textJoin">
                    <title name="TEXT1">!</title>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

       <block type="gamelab_setPrompt">
         <value name="QUESTION">
           <block type="text" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
             <title name="TEXT">far dshironi pr ditlindjen tuaj?</title>

coursea_maze_ramp1_2021.courseC_maze_programming1_a: Nse zogu nuk po arrin te derri, sigurohuni q t dy blloqet t jen klikuar plotsisht s bashku, pastaj klikoni "Ekzekuto" prsri.

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked">
    <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
    <value name="SPRITE">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"face_burger_1"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_spriteSay">
        <title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title>
        <value name="SPRITE">
          <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
            <title name="ANIMATION">"face_burger_1"</title>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block></xml>

csc-starquilts-12point-repeat_2023.hint1:
Vendosni numrin `12` n fushn e numrit t bllokut t lakut. 
Ndryshoni bllokun nga ana e djatht n 30 grad.

<xml><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="rhombus_shape_with_side_length"><field name="VALUE">smallRhombusRed</field><value name="SIZE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">35</field></block></value><next><block type="draw_turn"><field name="DIR">turnRight</field><value name="VALUE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>

csc-starquilts-4point-repeat_2023.hint1:
Kjo sht copa e kodit q prsritet: 
<xml><block type="rhombus_shape_with_side_length"><field name="VALUE">smallRhombusRed</field><value name="SIZE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">35</field></block></value><next><block type="draw_turn"><field name="DIR">turnRight</field><value name="VALUE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">90</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
csc-starquilts-4point-repeat_2023.hint2:
Vendosni copzn e kodit n nj bllok lak: 

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <field name="NUM">???</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="rhombus_shape_with_side_length">
            <field name="VALUE">smallRhombusMaroon</field>
            <value name="SIZE">
              <block type="math_number">
                <field name="NUM">35</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="draw_turn_by_constant_dropdown">
                <field name="DIR">turnRight</field>
                <field name="VALUE" config="30,60,90,120,180">90</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>
csc-starquilts-4point-repeat_2023.hint3:
Sa her prsritet modeli? 
4 her. 

Vendosni numrin 4 n fushn e numrit t bllokut t lakut. 

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <field name="NUM">4</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="rhombus_shape_with_side_length">
            <field name="VALUE">smallRhombusMaroon</field>
            <value name="SIZE">
              <block type="math_number">
                <field name="NUM">35</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="draw_turn_by_constant_dropdown">
                <field name="DIR">turnRight</field>
                <field name="VALUE" config="30,60,90,120,180">90</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

csc_animal_adaptaions_fishschool.hint1: Shtoni kto blloqe n ngjarjen kur peshku krijoi n hapsirn e puns. < "scale" 30 "begins" swimming in a group

csc_animal_adaptations_behavior_edit.behavior hint:
Provoni t redaktoni sjelljet! 

-   N cilin drejtim duhet t lviz zogu?

csc_animal_adaptations_behavior_edit2.behavior hint:
Provoni t redaktoni sjelljet! 

-   Cila vler po kontrollon shpejtsin e secilit sprite?
-   Sa m i madh numri aq m shpejt lviz sprite.

csc_animal_adaptations_behaviors_elephan.All Sprites: A po fillon sjellja e udhtimit pr t gjith spritet?

csc_animal_adaptations_behaviors_wolfpac.behavior: Blloku i ri i sjelljes shkon n fund t kodit q sht tashm n hapsirn e puns.
csc_animal_adaptations_behaviors_wolfpac.costumes: A jan vendosur kostumet n mnyr korrekte?

csc_animal_adaptations_birds.behavior 2:
Sjelljet e shtresimit:

-   Zgjidhni nj sjellje t ndryshme nga e para
-   Ju mund t shtoni sa m shum sjellje q dshironi

csc_animal_adaptations_bugs.dance:
Ju mund t zgjidhni do sjellje nga lista zbritse.
![](https://images.code.org/b93b1103cd53ca3112175529bc74e0f8-image-1681503579100.jpg)

csc_animal_adaptations_bugs2.storyboard_behavior_example:
Prdorni nj bllok sjelljeje sprite fillon. Klikoni n menun zbritse pr t zgjedhur nj sjellje t re.

<xml><block type="adaptations_toggleBehaviorSimple">
  <field name="TOGGLE">"begins"</field>
  <value name="SPRITE">
    <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
      <field name="ANIMATION">"ladybug2"</field>
    </block>
  </value>
  <value name="BEHAVIOR">
    <block type="adaptations_adaptationBehaviors" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
      <field name="BEHAVIOR">new Behavior(spinning_left, [])</field>
    </block>
  </value>
</block></xml>

csc_animal_adaptations_butterfly.Event1: Ngjarjet tashm jan vendosur n hapsirn e puns. Ju vetm duhet t shtoni sjelljet e reja n kodin ekzistues.
csc_animal_adaptations_butterfly.north: Ngjarja kur shtypet lart duhet t filloj sjelljen**migrimi i veriut**. ![](https://images.code.org/a61006611d4eb7c0b851d83fede0706f-image-1681504507726.png) Kur ngjarja e shtypur posht duhet t filloj sjelljen**migrimi jug**. ![](https://images.code.org/cf2d819a233774602c27f769407cc7ef-image-1681504783359.png)

csc_animal_adaptations_choice1.hint1: **A do t duhet kafsha t ndryshoj dika n trupin e tyre pr t mbijetuar? ** Shto nj bllok ndryshimi kostum. Prdorni nivelet n Msimin 1 pr m shum ide!

csc_animal_adaptations_fish.event 2:

![](https://images.code.org/b914b4625fcfc0c2f9b48b66ae7f1529-image-1681504075534.jpg)

csc_animal_adaptations_groups.hint1:
Ngjarja juaj kur klikohet duhet t duket kshtu: 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked">
  <field name="CONDITION">"when"</field>
  <value name="SPRITE">
    <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
      <field name="ANIMATION">"ladybug2"</field>
    </block>
  </value>
  <next>
    <block type="adaptations_toggleBehaviorSimple">
      <field name="TOGGLE">"stops"</field>
      <value name="SPRITE">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <field name="ANIMATION">"ladybug2"</field>
        </block>
      </value>
      <value name="BEHAVIOR">
        <block type="adaptations_adaptationBehaviors">
          <field name="BEHAVIOR">new Behavior(spinning_right, [])</field>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block>
  </next>
</block></xml>

csc_animal_adaptations_make_behavior.behavior hint: Redaktoni sjelljen pr t zgjidhur kt mister. Shtoni veprime n kodin e sjelljes.

csc_animal_adaptations_migration.Arrow keys: Prdorni tastin e shigjets lart pr t br lvizjen e balens n veri.
csc_animal_adaptations_migration.move_sprite_up_hint:
Shtoni kto blloqe pr ta br lvizjen tuaj t balens duke prdorur tastet e shigjetave:
<xml><block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false"><next><block type="gamelab_setBackgroundImageAs"><field name="IMG">"world-map"</field><next><block type="gamelab_makeNewSpriteAnon"><field name="ANIMATION_NAME">"whale-4"</field><value name="LOCATION"><block type="gamelab_location_picker" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><field name="LOCATION">{"x":165,"y":266}</field></block></value><next><block type="adaptations_toggleBehaviorSimple"><field name="TOGGLE">"begins"</field><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><field name="ANIMATION">"whale-4"</field></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><field name="VAR" id="moving with arrow keys">moving NSEW with arrow keys</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>

csc_ecosystems_algae_freeplay_2023.YouCan:
Ju mund t: 

-   Ndryshoni numrin e peshkut
-   Ndryshoni numrin e algave
-   Ndryshoni sa sekonda 
    derisa peshqit dhe algat t rigjenerohen
-   Bni modifikime t tjera

csc_ecosystems_arctic_2023.hint1: Ariu polar duhet t jet m i madh! Ndryshoni madhsin e saj pr t qen m shum se 30.
csc_ecosystems_arctic_2023.hint2: Ndryshoni sfondin n mnyr q t ket m shum akull pr ariu polar pr t gjuajtur.

csc_ecosystems_desert_2023.hint1:
Lepujt duhet t lvizin m shpejt! Ndryshoni 
shpejtsin e lepujve t jet m shum se 0.

csc_ecosystems_giraffe_evo_2023.first_event_hint:
A prdor ngjarja juaj (#6AF36C) gjirafn e qafs s shkurtr? 

A ndryshon kostumi nga qafa e shkurtr n t gjat\*\*?

Blloku i kostumit t ndryshimit duhet t duket kshtu:
<xml>
<block type="gamelab_setAnimation">
  <field name="ANIMATION">"giraffe_longer_neck"</field>
  <value name="THIS">
    <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation" movable="false">
      <field name="ANIMATION">"giraffe_shorter_neck"</field>
    </block>
  </value>
</block></xml>

csc_ecosystems_marsh_2023.Hint1: Ne kemi nevoj pr m shum bretkosa! Ndryshoni numrin e bretkosave t jet m shum se 0.

csc_ecosystems_ocean_algae_2023.Connect:
Sigurohuni q blloku i ngrnjes t jet i lidhur me bllokun e ngjarjes. 

Ata duhet t kapen s bashku si copa mister!

csc_ecosystems_ocean_boat_2023.Catch: Prdorni bllokun e objektit t kapur n mnyr q anija t kap peshkun
csc_ecosystems_ocean_boat_2023.CatchUnder:
Blloku i objektit t
kapur duhet t lidhet nn anijet prek ngjarjen e 
peshkut.

csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_2023.BlockInside: Vendosni bllokun e kostumit t ndryshimit brenda bllokut nse sht shum i algave.
csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_2023.Costume:
Nse ka shum alga, koralet do t dmtohen. 

Prdorni bllokun e ndryshimit t kostumit tjetr.
csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_2023.TooMuch: Lidhni bllokun nse shum alga me ngjarjen kur peshku prek algat.

csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_health_2023.Below: Mbani blloqe lidhse n pjesn e poshtme t hapsirs s puns ku keni prfunduar nivelin e fundit!
csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_health_2023.BlocksInside:
Nse ka shum pak alga, peshqit do t largohen. 

Vendosni blloqet e tjera brenda bllokut t algave nse sht shum pak.
csc_ecosystems_ocean_coral_health_2023.TooLittle: Lidhni bllokun nse shum pak alga me ngjarjen kur peshku prek algat.

csc_ecosystems_ocean_fish_2023.No Code: Nuk ka asgj pr t koduar ende. Vetm vzhgoni kt sistem n veprim.

csc_ecosystems_ocean_justright_algae.Bellow: Mbani blloqe lidhse n pjesn e poshtme t hapsirs s puns ku keni prfunduar nivelin e fundit!
csc_ecosystems_ocean_justright_algae.JustRight: Lidhni bllokun e algave nse sht e drejt me ngjarjen kur peshku prek algat.
csc_ecosystems_ocean_justright_algae.costume:
Nse algat jan t drejta, koralet
do t jen t shndetshme. 

Prdorni bllokun e ndryshimit t kostumit brenda bllokut t algave nse sht e drejt.

csc_ecosystems_rainforest_freeplay_2023.hint1:
Ka shum parrots! Ndryshoni
numrin e parrots t jet m pak se 8.

csc_ecosystems_solution1_2023.hint1:
Para se programi t filloj 0 peshq 
jan kapur. Prdorni `set FishCaught n 0` n krye t 
hapsirs s puns.
csc_ecosystems_solution1_2023.hint2:
Prdorni ndryshimin `Peshku i kapur nga 1`
nn bllokun e peshkut t kapur pr t numruar
secilin peshk q kap anija.
csc_ecosystems_solution1_2023.hint3:
Lidhni bllokun vark thot \*\* posht\*\*
bllokun `ndryshim peshKapur nga 1`

csc_ecosystems_solution1b_2023.hint1:
Mbani blloqe lidhse 
nn ngjarjen kur varka prek peshkun ku keni 
prfunduar nivelin e fundit!
csc_ecosystems_solution1b_2023.hint2: Pr ta br anijen t ndaloj peshkimin n peshk 5, lidhni bllokun nse FishCaught = 5" n fund t ngjarjes kur anija prek peshkun.
csc_ecosystems_solution1b_2023.hint3:
Pastaj shtoni bllokun `hiqni varkn` te
**brenda** `nse FishCaught = 5`bllok

csc_ecosystems_solution2_2023.Hint1: **Shnim**: Mund t'ju duhet t trhiqni disa nga kodet kur prek m posht n ekranin tuaj pr t'iu prshtatur blloqeve t reja.
csc_ecosystems_solution2_2023.hint2: N krye t hapsirs s puns, lidhni bllokun e sfondit kur t ekzekutoni.
csc_ecosystems_solution2_2023.hint3:
Nn sfond
lidheni fillon
peshkimi vetm n
zonn e peshkimit.

csc_ecosystems_solution3A_2023.hint1:
Shtoni blloqet e reja nn
bllokun prsritni do 4 sekonda.
csc_ecosystems_solution3A_2023.hint2:
Lidhni sfondin Pa peshkim
pran pjess s siprme t hapsirs s puns nn bllokun do 4 
sekonda.
csc_ecosystems_solution3A_2023.hint3:
Lidhu `filloni asnj peshkim`
nn asnj sfond peshkimi.

csc_ecosystems_solution3B_2023.hint1:
Shtoni blloqet e reja nn
bllokun e prsritur do 9 sekonda
csc_ecosystems_solution3B_2023.hint2:
Prdorni sfondin e peshkimit dhe sjelljen nuk filloni
sezonin e peshkimit

iceage_click_hello.iceage_click_hello_a: Shto nje ose me shume "actor 1 say" blloqe ne eventin "when clicked" per te kompletuar kete mister.

iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_a: A mund t'i beni Sid dhe Manny qe te kene nje beteje Ice Crystal?
iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_b: Beni Granny qe te ndjeke Diego. Perfundoni lojen si nje fitore pasi qe ajo e kape ate.
iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_c: A mudn ta beni Sidin te gjuaj me fjolla debore Diegon dhe rrisni madhesine e Diegos sado here qe ajo goditet? Perfundoni lojen si fitore nese Diego goditet 5 here.

iceage_hello1.iceage_hello1_a: Ju duhet te shtoni vetem nje bllok per te zgjedhur kete mister. Terhiqni bllokun "say" nga shiriti i veglave dhe lidheni ate me bllokun e eventit "when run" qe tashme eshte ne hapesiren e punes. Pastaj shkruani "Pershendetje!" brenda.

iceage_hello2.iceage_hello2_a: Per te zgjidhur kete mister, ju duhet ta beni Sidin te thote dicka duke perdorur "actor 1 say" bllokun. Ju poashtu duhet ta beni Mannin te thote dicka duke perdorur bllokun "actor 2 say".

iceage_move_events.iceage_move_events_a: Secila nga eventet "when\_\_\_\_arrow" do te duhet te kete nje tjeter 'veprim aktor 1' komande lidhur me te per te zgjidhur kete mister.

iceage_move_events_dani.iceage_move_events_a: Secila nga eventet "when\_\_\_\_arrow" do te duhet te kete nje tjeter 'veprim aktor 1' komande lidhur me te per te zgjidhur kete mister.

iceage_move_to_actor.iceage_move_to_actor_a: Per kete mister, ju mundesh te levizesh Diegon poshte per 200 pixela, ose te levizesh Mannyn larte nga 200 pixela.
iceage_move_to_actor.iceage_move_to_actor_b: Lidhni bllokun "play**\_**sound" me eventin "when actor 1 touches actor 2" per te perfunduar kete sfide.

iceage_move_to_flag.iceage_hello3_a: Perdorni bllokun "move actor 1 right by 200 pixels" per te zgjidhur kete mister.

iceage_repeat.iceage_repeat_a: Perdorni te dy blloqet "leviz aktorin 1 ne te majte" dhe "leviz aktorin 1 ne te djathte" per te zgjidhur kete mister.

iceage_sound_and_points.iceage_sound_and_points_a: Duhet te shtosh dy blloqe nen eventin 'kur aktori 1 prek aktorin 2'.
iceage_sound_and_points.iceage_sound_and_points_b: Do te duhen te dy blloqet 'sheno nje pike' dhe 'play \_\_\_\_ sound' per te kaluar kete nivel.

iceage_sound_and_points_dani.iceage_sound_and_points_a: Duhet te shtosh dy blloqe nen eventin 'kur aktori 1 prek aktorin 2'.
iceage_sound_and_points_dani.iceage_sound_and_points_b: Do te duhen te dy blloqet 'sheno nje pike' dhe 'play \_\_\_\_ sound' per te kaluar kete nivel.

iceage_throw_hearts.iceage_throw_hearts_a: Kur doni te hedhni zemrat tek gjyshja? Kur shtypet nje shigjete? Kur klikoni mbi Sidin? Kur klikoni mbi Granny? Zgjidhja eshte e juaja!
iceage_throw_hearts.iceage_throw_hearts_b: Per te bere te lumtur granny kur ajo i merr zemrat, ju do tre duhet ta lidhni 'set aktor 2 humor ne te lumtur' bllokun nen 'kur aktori 2 prek projektilin'

iceage_warn_ice_age.iceage_warn_ice_age_a: Duhet te shtoni vetem dy blloqe per te derguar kete mister aty ku duhet te shkoje.
iceage_warn_ice_age.iceage_warn_ice_age_b: Shto dy blloqe nen ngjarjen 'when run' qe te ekzekutohen menjehere pasi qe programi te filloje.

iceage_warn_ice_age_dani.iceage_warn_ice_age_a: Duhet te shtoni vetem dy blloqe per te derguar kete mister aty ku duhet te shkoje.
iceage_warn_ice_age_dani.iceage_warn_ice_age_b: Shto dy blloqe nen ngjarjen 'when run' qe te ekzekutohen menjehere pasi qe programi te filloje.
